Joe Pyfer has pulled out of tonight's UFC Fight Night in Mexico City due to illness, just hours before the event. The matchup against Kelvin Gastelum, which was set to be Gastelum's return to middleweight, has been canceled. It remains to be seen whether the UFC will reschedule the fight for a later date. Pyfer was looking to continue his momentum in the division after a strong performance last July, where he knocked out Marc-André Barriault. As UFC President Dana White said, 'No bout is good to go until the cage door closes behind both athletes.'
